forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Occasional showers, with increasing winds for the afternoon. High 11C. Winds WNW at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with showers. Becoming windy for the afternoon. High around 50F. Winds WNW at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. Slight chance of a shower throughout the evening. Low around 5C. Winds NNW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. Slight chance of a shower throughout the evening. Low near 40F. Winds NNW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly sunny. High 14C. Winds NW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mainly sunny sky. High 56F. Winds NW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. Low near 5C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly clear early, then a few clouds later on. Low 41F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mix of clouds and sun early, then becoming cloudy later in the day. Slight chance of a rain shower. High 12C. Winds WSW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy. Slight chance of a rain shower. High 53F. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 9C. Winds S at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early, becoming a steady rain late. Low 47F. Winds S at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. Winds increasing late. High 12C. Winds SW at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy and windy with periods of rain. High 52F. Winds SW at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and wind early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low 6C. Winds WSW at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and wind early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low 42F. Winds WSW at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High near 10C. Winds WSW at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. High 49F. Winds WSW at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. Low 6C. Winds SW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Occasional rain. Low 41F. Winds SW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High around 10C. Winds WSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. High 49F. Winds W at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Some clouds early will give way to generally clear conditions overnight. Low 4C. Winds W at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Low 37F. Winds W at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly sunny skies. High 12C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly sunny skies. High 53F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies. Low 4C. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mostly clear sky. Low 37F. Winds NNE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny. High 14C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly sunny. High 56F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear skies. Low around 5C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear skies. Low around 40F. Winds NNE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly sunny. High near 15C. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny skies. High 57F. Winds NNE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Generally fair. Low 7C. Winds NE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear skies. Low 43F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High around 15C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. High 59F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy during the evening. A few showers developing later during the night. Low 7C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early giving way to a few showers after midnight. Low 43F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 30%.
